00021 class LowLevelController{
00022 private:
00023     int opstate; // use the states defined in the enum above. 
00024     Motor motors[4];// front, back, right, left; //initialized in the init function
00025     int PIDouts[4]; // the throttle outputs for roll, pitch, yaw and the altitude
00026     int cmndThrottles[4]; // found from the PID outputs
00027     OrientationAndHeading IMU;
00028     int hasWarmedUp;
00029     int warmUpTime;
00030 public:
00031   LowLevelController();
00032   void init();
00033   int  isWarmedUp();
00034   void PIDpitch();
00035   void PIDroll();
00036   void PIDyaw();
00037   void PIDaltitude();
00038   int setAllQuiet();
00039   /* how to implement the PIDs
00040   
00041   commaned = K * (E + 1/Ti integral(E)dt + KD * (E - E*(n-1))/dt) + bias
00042   commanded: control output
00043   K: controller gain, unitless
00044   1/Ti = reset gain constant (repeats per minute)
00045   KD = rate gain constant (min)
00046   dt = time between samples (min)
00047   bias = output bias 
00048   E = error; equal to measured min set point or set point  minus measured min
00049   E(n-1) = error from last sample
00050   
00051   */
00052   void calcThrottles();
00053   void updateMotors();
00054   Motor getMotor(int);
00055   
00056 };
